bibl.title: Letter from Howard A. Kelly's [secretary?] to Robert E. Noble, October 17, 1922

div1.p: Kelly's [secretary?] desires to know if a biography of Gorgas has been published.

div1.head: Letter from Howard A. Kelly's [secretary?] to Robert E. Noble, October 17, 1922
div1.opener:
FROM DR. HOWARD A. KELLY
October 17, 1922.
Tuesday
Dear General Noble:
div1.p:
Doctor Kelly is anxious to know
if there has yet been published a life of General
Gorgas. If there is such a biography, will you
please let us know by whom it has been written and
who are the publishers.
